about_the_game:
There are two versions of basic hell and hell. Recovering memories and escaping hell 2D games of the main character, "The Dutiful Person," who is taken to hell with no memory while fighting with the Grim Reaper who drags her mother without knowing that her mother has ended her life
This hell is set in seven hells.
Also, as you play this game, you can enjoy content that escapes from hell through various visual effects and psychological fights with developers.
Don't think you lost a psychological battle with a developer while playing the game, but continue to escape hell until the end. Good luck.
Will you ever escape hell?
Requires play at 1920x1080 (1080p) resolution
Player Key
-> A, : Right, Space : Jump
There are several stages where the jump will reset when it hits the wall. This is not a bug.
Also, there is a stage where you need a key to open the door
Stage where the jump is initialized : Stage1, Stage2, Stage6, Stage1(Hell Mode), Stage2(Hell Mode), Stage6(Hell Mode)

name: Samsara(윤회)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows7/8/10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT1030
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows7/8/10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT1030
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
